'''Ding Ding Ding!''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by successfully catching [[Fishing|fish]].

==Achievements==
{{Achievements by Category Table|Ding Ding Ding!}}

==Gameplay Notes==
*The bonus fish caught using [[Thoma]]'s passive talent [[Snap and Swing]] do not count towards this total.
